## Intro to R


### Arithmetic運算

* 只能是數值(不可以用"six"取代6)
```
 Addition + 
 Subtraction -
 Multiplication *  
 Division / 
 Exponentiation ^  (e.g. 3^2=9, 12^12=144)
 Modulo %% (e.g.12%%12=0,8%%5=3)
```
 
### Variable assignment變數
 
```
 <-
 '文字' <- '數值'或'邏輯值'或'文字'
 e.g. 1  x <- 42
      2  x
      [1]42
```
